彰化.definition: Zhanghua or Changhua city and county in west Taiwan

彰化市.definition: Zhanghua or Changhua city in west Taiwan, capital of Changhua county

彰化縣.definition: Zhanghua or Changhua County in west Taiwan

彰善癉惡.definition: to distinguish good and evil (idiom); to uphold virtue and condemn evil; to praise good and expose vice

彰明.definition: to show clearly; to make public; obvious

彰明較著.definition: obvious; clear for all to see

彰武.definition: Zhangwu county in Fuxin 阜新, Liaoning

彰武縣.definition: Zhangwu county in Fuxin 阜新, Liaoning

彰顯.definition: to put on display (sth abstract); to draw attention to; conspicuous
